title: Sports shock from the Coronavirus
itunes:title: Sports shock from the Coronavirus
description:
Filling in for Colin, Jason McIntyre talks about the impact the Coronavirus is having on the sports world, how he is staying safe, and how long he believes this will continue. Guests include Dan Wetzel, Dr. Amesh Adalja, and Brian Dutcher.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
